desc: JavaScript is an object-oriented scripting language that enables you to modify a document’s structure, styling, and content in response to user actions. This handy pocket serves as both a quick introduction to the language and acts a valuable reference. It’s packed with tips as well as JavaScript syntax, methods, and properties. Concise and inexpensive, it’s exactly the guide many web designers and developers need.
title: The JavaScript Pocket Guide (Peachpit Pocket Guide)
